Name: The Ghost
About the game: A simple visual novel consisting of only music, photos and text. It's a game like a play. All photos were taken here in Aomori, a provincial city in Japan. Press a button to move through the text and background. You can select Japanese or English from the menu at the bottom. About ghosts that cause everyday mishaps. Why do you see ghosts? Seemingly unrelated things are connected. All things are connected by underground stems.
